title: WTB N162, N28, or N172 Cap Anson
author: pokerplyr80

posts.post_title: WTB N162, N28, or N172 Cap Anson
posts.post_content: Looking to buy my first 19th century card, and I figure this will be a good place to start. Definitely prefer the N162 but don't know if I can find one in my price range.  Would like to stay around 1500.  Let me know if anyone has one available.
Also open to other interesting cards
Just picked up a nice N172 from member vwtdi, still open to others though, especially if anyone has an Anson they'd like to part with.
